title: Potential Ideas for Fiora
body:
So my friend and I were talking while having a 1v1, and we had an idea how to help out Fiora's...slightly underwhelming ultimate.

We thought, what if when she was in the area indicated by the ultimate, she could use her q on a similar cd as Yasuo dashes, costs no mana, but it does no damage? It would give her a way of positioning herself to hit weakpoints while sticking with her theme of a duelist, kind of like a manual Blade Waltz of motion.
